about_the_game:
【Experience a New Sensation! A Novel Action Game】

・The Most Difficult Action Climbing Game

For those of you who are no longer satisfied with ordinary mountain climbing games

Extreme challenges await you. The seemingly simple goal of climbing is the ultimate test!

・Just Keep Going Up!

There is only one goal: the path to the top!

・Build Up Your Power and Unleash It!

Press and hold to adjust your jump distance and release at the perfect moment! You'll likely fail countless times before mastering the jump.

・One Mistake and All Is Lost!

A single mistake can ruin everything, creating a heart-pounding tension.

・Concentration is Key

Focus all your energy and move forward step by step.

・End of the game Save Only

Player's progress can be saved only at the end of the game. You cannot load from any point. Retry as many times as you need, carving your path with determination!

・An Addictive Challenge!

Though simple in action, this game requires skilled techniques. Enjoy the challenge and experience the process of improving.

Supports VRM Files:

Use your avatar the protagonist and dive into the adventure world! (Humanoid avatars are recommended. Correct animation is not guaranteed for all avatars.We recommend that you check the operation with the trial version before purchasing.)

・ Feel free to stream live gameplay.

※The demo version currently exists only to verify VRM and VRoid Hub model loading behavior due to bug issues. Please note that you will not be able to play it.

【Story】

Alone in a village shrouded in fog, there is no sign of life. In a world where no one exists, it never occurred to him that there could be anyone else.

...Until this moment.

One day, a toy bear fell from the sky. It brought a shake to his lonely daily life. Could there be someone else in this world besides him?

The protagonist begins his adventure high up in the sky. What lies beyond the fog? He seeks the answer.

During his journey, the records of those who once aimed for the sky to escape the fog appear before him. Following in their footsteps, he seeks the truth, wondering if there is still someone or something alive in the sky.

・The Most Difficult Action Climbing Game

For those of you who are no longer satisfied with ordinary mountain climbing games

Extreme challenges await you. The seemingly simple goal of climbing is the ultimate test!

A single mistake can ruin everything, creating a heart-pounding tension.

Focus all your energy and move forward step by step.

・End of the game Save Only

・An Addictive Challenge!

Though simple in action, this game requires skilled techniques. Enjoy the challenge and experience the process of improving.

【Story】

Alone in a village shrouded in fog, there is no sign of life. In a world where no one exists, it never occurred to him that there could be anyone else.

One day, a toy bear fell from the sky. It brought a shake to his lonely daily life. Could there be someone else in this world besides him?

The protagonist begins his adventure high up in the sky. What lies beyond the fog? He seeks the answer.

During his journey, the records of those who once aimed for the sky to escape the fog appear before him. Following in their footsteps, he seeks the truth, wondering if there is still someone or something alive in the sky.
